author: Elisha Fieldstadt
title: Swift coronavirus testing needed before reopening country, CDC director says
description: "There's no doubt that we have to reopen correctly," Robert R. Redfield said, adding it would be "a step-by-step gradual process, that's got to be data-driven."
content:
The director for the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Monday that in order for the country to reopen, swift testing for people who have the virus and for people who might be immune to the virus will need to be available.
